awd_titl_txt: Critical Measurements of the Large (Ms = 7.1) Santa Cruz    Mountains, California Earthquakes under Urgent Conditions
awd_abstract_narration: This grant will fund urgently needed support through the SGER                 program to cover the critical costs for field measurements of                   the large (Ms=7.1) Santa Cruz Mountains earthquake, for data                    reduction, data analysis and for rapid distribution of this                     information to the scientific community.  Prior to the main shock               on October 17, 1989, the principal investigator, on the basis of                two large foreshocks, installed four digital strong ground motion               recorders in the area of main shock which recorded invaluable                   strong motion data.  This grant will support that work and enable               follow-on analysis of the aftershock series.  This work has                     direct application to the National Earthquake Hazard Reduction                  Program.
